location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary at Bombay Castle, to Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident at Bushire, acknowledging the receipt of his letter dated 4 June, reporting the death of Saood [Imam Saud al kabeer bin Abdul-Aziz bin Muhammad bin Saud], the Wahabee [Wahhabi] Chief, who was succeeded by his eldest son, Abdilla ibin Saood [Abdullah bin Saud].
